text: Salah satu liburan terbik yang saya alami di bali karna bisa menginap di villa ini. Sungguh menyenangkan. Villanya indah, jauh dari keramaian bali dan kebisingan, sangat mengutamakn privasi dan staffnya pun benar-benar berpengalaman
title: pengalaman tak terlupakan

text: Sunggu satu minggu yang mengagumkan! Kami adalah bagian dari perjalanan keluarga yang dari 15 orang dan menyewa 4 dari 5 villa di untuk merayakan ulang tahun dan pernikahan selama 7 hari. Sebuah pesta yang indah disiapkan dan kembang api diatur dengan privasi yang cukup agar tidak mengganggu tamu vila yang lain. Ini merupakan perubahan yang indah dari sibuknya jalanan di Kuta dengan sambutan hangat dan sawah sekitar yang menenangkan. Dengan semua 4 villa dihubungkan dengan pintu geser, nampak cukup jelas berapa banyak perawatan yang telah dialirkan ke desain dan perabotan vila-vila ini. Ada bagian dari Bali yang berbeda di setiap kamar, dan makanannya yang benar-benar menakjubkan. Mengobrol dan bersenang-senang dengan karyawan membuatnya masa-masa di antara waktu makan menjadi lebih mengesankan. Dan aku ingatkan, memiliki kolam renang anda sendiri untuk diselami setelah hari yang panas adalah sesuatu yang selalu kutunggu! Aku pasti akan kembali untuk lokasi serta semua hal di atas. Tidak sabar untuk mengunjungi SABA Villas lagi!
title: Surga!

photos.caption: On your way to restaurants and attractions
Gorgeous bathroom with exclusive SABA soups
View from our open door to family's villa

text: Saya dan istri sudah empat kali ke Bali dalam 20 tahun terakhir dan sampai hari ini kami selalu menginap di berbagai resor hotel - saat berlibur berdua, bersama keluarga dekat, dan keluarga besar. Pengalaman terakhir kami betul-betul mengubah pemikiran kami! Kami baru pulang dari liburan seminggu di Bali, menginap di Saba Villas bersama keluarga kami dan keluarga besar istri saya - total kami 13 orang dan berusia antara 79  dan 11. Tidak ada lagi resor hotel buat kami! Pengalaman menginap di Saba Villas luar biasa. Anda mendapat keuntungan menginap di resor hotel (makanan bervariasi, pengaturan perjalanan/tur, layanan 24 jam, concierge yang siaga, perawatan spa, dsb, dsb) tetapi di level yang lebih personal lagi; ini yang membedakannya. Di tempat ini semuanya melayani Anda bukan melayani 100-an hotel yang menginap di hotel. Pengalaman berkesan di Saba Villas yang membedakan dalam hal luar biasa (bintang 5+), pelayanan dari Bagus, Made, dan staf lain, bagaimana vila-vila tersebut (ada 5 di dalam kompleks tersebut) ditata supaya mereka bisa menampung rombongan keluarga besar (seperti kami) dan pasangan. Perabotannya berkualitas tinggi dan lapang dan level kenyamanan vila itu sendiri, juga taman yang ada disekeliling vila privat, kolam renang, dan tempat makan luar ruangan/area ruang keluarga. Perempuan spa lokal bisa dipanggil ke vila untuk memijat juga sebuah bonus - tidak ada biaya tambahan. Kami sangat beruntung bisa berlibur dan menginap di banyak hotel bintang 5 di seluruh dunia selama bertahun-tahun - Saba Villas diatas semuanya!
title: Lupakan resor hotel!

text: Setelah 8 malam penuh kebahagiaan di Saba saat Natal 2012, saya tidak bisa merekomendasikan tempat ini terlalu tinggi. Kami berangkat bersama keluarga berjumlah 13 orang, berkisar dari usia 11 sampai usia 80, dengan kebutuhan bervariasi dan bermacam-macam. Staf vila benar-benar luar biasa. Mereka hangat, perhatian, dan tulus mengerjakan apa saja yang membuat liburan Anda sempurna - gunakan pengetahuan dan informasi lokal dari mereka untuk memudahkan semua hal, seperti berbelanja, lalu lintas, restoran, penukaran mata uang, hal medis, dan ekskursi. Saba Villas dikelola dengan sempurna dan kolam renangnya bersih dan berkilau. Kamar mandinya bebas noda (walau letaknya di luar) dan furnitur dan pendingin ruangannya bekerja luar biasa. Fasilitasnya menakjubkan, Segala yang rusak atau tidak jalan diperbaiki atau diganti segera, dengan senyum dan permohonan maaf. Koki Made luar biasa - banyak masukan, dan ia sangat kompeten memasak makanan gaya barat dan hidangan Indonesia yang luar biasa - yang paling ENAK nasi goreng! Pengemudinya mengambil keputusan brilian di Kuta yang mengerikan/kemacetan Seminyak, dan Bagus, Made, Sunni, Dewi, dan semua staf yang lain benar-benar luar biasa. Terima kasih semuanya, karena membuat Natal keluarga kami begitu berkesan. Saya tidak ingin menginap di tempat lain!!!!
title: Surga di Saba.

text: I was in Baii with my three daughters for a month  and stayed in  a few Villas and a hotel.  Saba was by far our best experience.  The actual villa is beautiful, fantastic garden space and beautiful outdoor bathrooms.  The location is great, it's close to the beach and shopping,. The Villa allows guests access to Finns beach club and there is a car that guests have access to.  The food is authentic, fresh and very well prepared.   Breakfast is included, the food was so good, we ate most of our lunches and dinners in the Villa.   On our last night we experienced their special candle light dinner, the Chef came over the day before and created a custom menu for us.   The pool is amazing, and the gardens are beautiful and vey well looked after.  What makes Saba Villas extra extra amazing is the staff.  I can't say enough about how professional, polite and competent and well trained  they all are.  Thank you Made,  Mojito and everyone at Saba, we will most definitely see you the next time we are in Bali!

text:
We stayed in Arjuna, the single bedroom villa and it was the lovely secluded oasis that we expected. the only negative would be that a neighbouring villa overlooked the pool area.

The staff were very service oriented and charming. Made, the GM, went out of his way to be helpful.

Some things to be aware of.

When it was first built the villas were in a quiet area in the middle of rice paddies. Being close to Seminyak, this was the first part of Canggu to become quite developed. As such its now quite developed and the traffic is busy. We like to go for walks but walking in the local area was quite unpleasant as the streets are narrow, very busy and there are no footpaths. To make up for this the staff will happily drive you anywhere, even if its 2 minutes up the road.

The included meals were fine but not brilliant.

Overall a very pleasant and enjoyable stay but for our next visit I'd look for something further west (towards Echo Beach) where it's a little quieter and easier to get around. Otherwise you might as well stay in Seminyak.
title: Lovely villa lovely staff

owner_response.text:
Thanks for your kind and honest feedback ..this is much appreciated. 
Andy
Yes it is a pity Bali has generally become very crowded, even the area you mention, Echo Beach. It is nice that we are 100 m off the main road and have no building behind us. 
We have little control over the building of neighbouring villas, but have installed screens on areas which may be considered lacking in privacy. As you said we have a free shuttle to help people move around anywhere in the vicinity of our Villas. Thank you once again for your comments. We are always looking to continuously improve. 
Kind regards

text:
Set well away from the street, Saba Villas is nice and quiet, but still close enough to shops and restaurants that you walk to if desired, and there is a large supermarket only metres away. 

Our one bedroom villa (there are two-bedroom versions) was spacious, comfortable and well appointed. There is a large fridge, stocked with drinks and snacks at reasonable prices, a Bluetooth speaker for playing your own music, a cooktop and microwave and, of course, a 10 metre private pool. 

 The bedroom is air conditioned and also has a ceiling fan, TV, safe and plenty of wardrobe space. The Villas offer about 80 in-house movies and the service is outstanding.  Your butler will bring your free breakfast every morning, which was delicious, and the rooms are well cleaned and tidied daily. 

The villa has a car and driver that can drop you to surrounding attractions, but you’ll need to organise your own trip back. Aim for a Blue Bird Group taxi if possible (read some other reviews about taxis in Bali for more information).

We organised to hire a motor scooter through the Villa at Rp 70,000 per day (about $7 Aussie dollars).  The bike that was dropped off and picked up was almost new, and came with two helmets and made getting around so much easier. 

All in all, I would definitely recommend Saba Villas as a great place to stay in Canggu.
title: Private villa in great location

text:
Our family (2 adults, 2 young children) had a fantastic stay at the Bima Villa @ Saba Villas over the last week.  The staff was there to welcome us with smiles and continued to smile and outshine all other bali villa service we have experienced throughout our stay.  The villa itself is great for a family with 2 children or two couples as the bedrooms are well sized (bigger than expected!) and the outdoor bathrooms are very well maintained. 

The facilities within the villa are great with a lovely pool, sitting area and grass to run around.   We requested a BBQ at the villa one evening and the staff and Singing Chef Made did a fantastic job our friends were raving about the food for the rest of the week. 

The complimentary membership to Finns Beach and Rec club is a real plus as gives you access to the gym at the Rec club along with discounts at the other facilities within all of Finns.    Big thanks to the staff at Saba who provide transport on request as well. 

Do note, as with all places in Bali, you are in the tropics, there may be sounds outside from the friendly geckos, frogs, etc. But the villas are set away from the main road which is a nice treat from some other places (not hearing the constant drone of motorbikes driving by!). 

Overall we had a great stay, we look forward to seeing the staff at Saba again when we visit next time.
title: Great villa, staff and location! Thank you Saba!

Picked up from the airport and only a short 30 min drive to the villa itself (slightly longer due to busy mid day traffic but no complaints!). Staff extremely friendly and welcomed us with drinks and friendly smiles. Information aplenty at the villa, the owners have put together a great book for each villa. VIP entry to Finns recreational beach resort and bar, which we hit up twice for stunning sun sets. My wife and I happened to bump into one of the owners Andy who showed us around the villa he stays in, Yudistira, wow, wow, wow. 10/10. Amazing hosts, breathtaking architecture and stunning surrounds. We will be back! (It being our friends second time in two years, hence why they had to invite us this year!).

text:
When arriving late evening to the villa, after midnight, the staff were extremely friendly, showed me all of the features of the villa, breakfast options for the morning and allowed myself in peace, as I was exhausted travelling from Australia. 

The villa complex is an ideal location, central to Seminyak and Canggu. It's tucked away from the main road and there's plenty of tree foliage to block out the usual Bali traffic noise. 

The villa was equipped with everything you could dream of! A full kitchen, a pool, free standing bath in the open air - outdoor bathroom. The cleanliness was 5*, the staff were 5* and the breakfast options exceeded my expectations. 

I enjoyed the privacy of each villa, staying in Bali for years and a troubled sleeper, it's important for me to have a nice, quiet place of the evening, there were no barking dogs or roosters crowing all night, this is a huge plus while staying in Bali! 

Absolutely loved staying with Saba Villas, I'll be sure to recommend to friends, family and anyone else who may ask for Luxury accommodation in Canggu.
title: Tucked away in quiet, ideal location of Canggu

text: The property is outstanding. The villas are tastefully decorated in contemporary Balinese style with all amenities to self cater, if that is your preference.  In villa dining is available and breakfast is included.  Breakfast included good coffee in a French press or tea, freshly squeezed juice and a choice of cold or hot options, including vegetarian/vegan options. The food is delicious.  The ambience is tropical and Peaceful. The villa is within walking distance of the beach, grocery store, atm, and a salon. In villa massages can be arranged and we enjoyed our massages, pool side. There are yoga classes nearby.  The stay also include access to the nearby club that has pools, gym and fitness classes.  The staff will facilitate bookings and your access to Bali.  The staff will accommodate you where possible with rides to the shopping and restaurant areas of Canggu and Seminyak. Made and the staff are so thoughtful, attentive and efficient to enhance our stay.  Thank you.

text:
We recently stayed here for 7 nights. The Villas are amazing, the service was incredible and there is nothing they won't do to ensure you have a fabulous holiday. We travelled with our 3 sons (aged 2, 4 and 7). The Villas have complimentary passes to Finns Recreation Park which provided great entertainment for the kids each morning. We went to the water slides each day and did the trampolining one morning when it rained. 
Afternoons were spent going into Seminyak (20min to 30min drive depending on traffic) or hanging around the beautiful villa swimming. 
There is a supermarket, patisserie and chemist at the top of the driveway which makes buying provisions easy including great coffee. There are limited footpaths so not great for prams though. 
The service is the villa was fabulous. Made was great and Mojito was fantastic. His warm and friendly greetings each day were lovely and the kids adored all the staff. They would organise massages etc at anytime and just generally were very helpful. The food they served was also terrific and nothing was too much of a hassle.
I would highly recommend visiting La Laguna for afternoon cocktails and early dinner. It has a huge grass area for the kids and is a lovely setting with great food.
We also visited Lawn which was also great for kids and nice for a few drinks in the afternoon with live music.
If you are looking for a meal out (that is close by) One Eyed Jack was sensational. 
Overall Saba Villas were fantastic however the service they provided was what made this trip so memorable. Thank you to Made, Mojito and the whole team for an incredible holiday. We will be back.
title: Bali Villa Holiday

text: We spent four nights here at the end of May to celebrate my birthday. We were upgraded to Bima, which is nothing short of stunning. The villa has the most glorious outdoor area, two bedrooms, a massive pool & a full kitchen/dining area (seats 10 people!). We were a little unsure of the outdoor bathroom at first, but I can tell you, it's pure bliss! There was a good selection for breakfast, we'd just let them know the night before, what time we'd want it & in the morning it would be there for us, table set & served! Saba is situated off the road & with only 5 villas on the property, it's very serene & peaceful. It's so relaxing here that you won't want to leave the villa-absolutely everything is there for you. There's a fabulous Parisian Bakery right next door (which serves fantastic coffee) & also a supermarket to grab some supplies from. There is some construction going on next door, but it's not overly intrusive. They will drop you off anywhere in the local area/Seminyak & also provide bicycles to explore, however we didn't take advantage of these. They also have an array of activities that they can arrange for you, along with in villa massages (which were spectacular!) The staff here are absolutely beautiful & will do anything for you to make your stay comfortable. Thank you to Ross, Made, Mojito & all the staff for making our stay one of the most memorable yet. Thank you also for my gorgeous birthday cake which was brought after breakfast by the staff along with a Happy Birthday tune! We're looking very forward to seeing you all again in 2018.
title: Bliss!

text:
Don’t be put off or fooled by the nondescript entrance to the villas.  The narrow but beautifully landscaped path only helps to build the drama as you arrive to a warm welcome in a lush tropical courtyard.  After the flurry of hellos and the frangipani necklaces have been placed around your neck, you’re lead through an enchanting entrance to your own private oasis.

Whether you’ve chosen the 1 bedroom, 2 bedroom or Master Villa, the immediate feeling of awe and tranquility is exactly the same.  The villas are tastefully decorated in a modern Balinese theme, the gardens are meticulously maintained, the amenities are hard to fault and the unpretentious architecture draws your eye to subtle yet well considered detail.

Since 2009 my family and I have stayed at Saba 11 times, with the most recent visit just last week.  The staff are truly wonderful, attentive and incredibly hospitable. They always inquire after our children and show a genuine interest in our families.  We really appreciate the familiarity, discretion and generosity of the team at Saba.  Returning to Saba year after year feels like catching up with old friends.

In our opinion they have achieved the right balance of service, comfort, experience and privacy.  But don’t take my word for it, experience it for yourself, you’ll never stay in a resort, or anywhere else again for that matter.
title: Your own private oasis

text:
Arriving late into Bali we are picked up by Made our butler. The villas are a delight. Clean with lots of room. The outdoor living area is spacious, overlooking the best pool I have had in a villa so far. The breakfasts are delicious served in our villa each morning. Obviously inspired by Australians. Smashed avocado - won't get that in any other villa in Bali! Kind, friendly staff. Unfortunately this area is the worst I've stayed in Bali. We were horrified to find we couldn't walk anywhere because the roads are so narrow with no footpaths and dangerous because you have to walk with all the traffic. Even busy Kuta you can walk around.They have free bicycle hire but no one could use this service as it is dangerous. The plus side of all this is again the courtesy toward their guests in driving us to local restaurants and the nearby Canggu Club. The restaurant prices are similar to Sydney in the higher end places of which there were quite a few. 
Thank you to the staff for being so kind.
title: Welcoming staff, beautiful villas and best swimming pool!

owner_response.text:
Dear SunnyDebW,
The owners and Staff very much appreciate your very kind comments about Saba thank you. Yes we are very proud of what we have developed here. We built the villas 7 years ago amongst the rice paddies and open space away from the madding crowd. However Canggu has grown to now be the sought after area and is surpassing Seminyak as desirable. We too are very concerned about the traffic and we apologise, notwithstanding this is something beyond our control. But as you indicated we do have a free shuttle car "at your service' and are pleased you took advantage of this. The plans are for the council to build a footpath beside the road in the near future....We do hope you return ..thank you,
Andy and Ross

text:
First time to Bali,

After a 3 day boat cruise with no air con or decent toilet, what luxury to come to Saba villas. Villas literally breath taking and to a very high standard. Private pool and rest area outdoors also. Bathroom and rain shower outside giving you the sense of occupying your own piece of rainforest. Staff were fantastic, polite and looked to help in any way they could!!!

Great way to end the holiday!!!
title: Fantastic stay at Saba villas

text:
My partner and I have stayed at Saba Villas twice now and I can honestly say they're the nicest villas I've ever visited! Everything is impeccable and perfectly thought through. From the chilled facial towels you receive when you're picked up from the airport, to the welcome drink, to the his and hers silk dressing gowns and sarongs, to the personal swimming pools and AMAZINGLY beautiful bathrooms, complete with delicious boutique amenities.... we will most certainly be going back!!

The food is a highlight! The first time we visited was for my 30th and the chef arranged a "romantic dinner" which was a four course, restaurant quality meal, complete with flower petal heart on the floor and lanterns glittering in all the trees! And the second time we came for a friends' birthday with a large group, and the chef put on a whole roasted Balinese big! Amazing. 

I cannot recommend this place enough :)
title: Most beautiful villas in Bali

text:
I had the extraordinary pleasure of staying in Saba Villas Bali, and would not hesitate in recommending this place - it was simply perfect. The attention to detail is extraordinary - the food is delicious (and well-priced), the staff are very friendly and kind, the architecture is thoughtful, and the villas themselves offer the perfect place to relax. The location is close enough to the heart of Bali, yet it feels a little bit more private and more removed. The surrounding areas of Canggu are dazzling, with rice patties, restaurants, warungs, bars and beaches all around. Whether you're soaking in the semi-outdoor bathroom, taking a dip in the pool or reading on the couch, you're sure to have a truly relaxing time. The villas are spacious, so it would be easy to go as a couple or as a family - you will feel like you are in your own private oasis. If you're a slightly larger group - there is the opportunity to book two villas side by side and create an open walkway between the two (carefully concealed behind the lush garden). 
Saba Villas have my highest recommendation - you'll want to come back again and again!
title: Extraordinary villas, incredible hospitality - nothing short of paradise!

text: I spent three nights at Saba with my partner. We were both blown-away by the villa itself - beautifully set up with an open living room, kitchen areas and a private pool. The food there was spectacular, western-style but with an Indonesian twist. It was by far the best food we had during our time in Indonesia. The staff were so friendly and helpful. We were totally spoilt. Cant recommend this place more!
title: Delightful

text: We stayed at Saba and it was such a special experience. Saba is the place to go for indulgence and luxury. The villas were beautiful, the food absolutely delicious, the outdoor showers indulgent, and the staff friendly and helpful. There were a couple of great bars nearby which made for easy evening options. Overall, we felt totally spoilt by the lovely staff and relaxing surroundings.
title: Indulgence with a smile

text: This was our 4th time staying at Villa Saba and we were again blown away by the experience!  The location of the villas is getting better and better... meaning, as Canggu grows, there are more and more restaurants as grocery stores opening up with in walking distance.   The villas are all very private but can also be joined to share a yard - which is wonderful when traveling with friends and family. The Staff is second to none - they are all so friendly, helpful, and fun to be around.  The food is excellent and the menu has a nice variety of delicious choices. LOVE this place!
title: Another stellar stay

text: The Saba Villas are a stunning sanctuary in the heart of Canngu. Its lavishness is emphasised by its elegant and thoughtful architecture. The staff are really lovely too, my word they really do look after your every need (something that takes some adjusting to on returning home!). If you appreciate attention to detail like me, Saba has this covered with its menu (my tip is the ribs!), gardens and general cleanliness. I had the most amazing week here with my partner and friends, I have no doubt you will too.
title: Opulence at its finest

text: I spent a week at Saba with a group of friends. It was an absolute dream from start to finish. The staff were incredibly friendly and accommodating, even helping when the airline lost some of my baggage. The villas are beautiful, with an attention to detail and respect for the natural surroundings that gives a sense of peace and tranquility. My time there gave me a new perspective of how good a holiday in Bali could be. I will definitely be visiting again!
title: The Perfect Getaway

text: My family and I summered at the Saba Villas and cannot wait to go back. We had been to Bali before but arguably Saba has better service, pool, gardens and food than the Grand Hyatt and Ayodya.  Really everything has been thought of, it exceeded my expectations. Not to mention Saba is in Bali's coolest new area Canggu. We took bicycles to brilliant organic cafes and boutique shopping all amongst the rice fields. We had to-die-for massages set in our private garden and were so affordable. Chef Made created beautiful menus for us with family recipes we sent through in advance. I didn't feel like just another guest in a big hotel complex. The staff are genuine and thoughtful. And Canggu feels like the beautiful Bali you've read and seen in movies.
title: Singularly remarkable

photos.caption: Beautiful pool set in your private garden

text:
We stayed here for a long birthday weekend with friends and it was incredible. The villas were well set up for hanging out together, but with plenty of space to retreat to our own private space. 

The staff were wonderful. It is relatively easy to find a nice place to stay in Bali, but the staff made our experience at Saba Villas feel over the top luxurious. They managed to be there when we needed them, invisible when we didn't, and keep on top of food orders for 18 people.

The breakfast warrants a special mention. Incredibly yummy smashed avocado with eggs poached to perfection and proper french press coffee. 

Walking distance to the beach, and Old Man's so surfing was an easy option too.

A weekend without a care in the world...
title: Amazing escape from reality

text:
Villa Saba was truly heaven - to the extent that we almost didn't want to leave the villa! A secluded haven in the middle of bustling Canggu, everything from the art and decor to spaciousness, to high-end ameneties, stunning outdoor showers and private pools - and especially: the AMAZING and loving staff - just nothing short of impressive. 

Plus, access to the Canggu Club completely made our trip!

We felt like we were waving goodbye to family when we drove away. I could not recommend this little slice of heaven more highly to anyone staying in Canggu.

Thank you to everyone at Saba who made our stay so wonderful!
title: Simply beautiful in every way.
