text:
I recently celebrated a milestone birthday at Saba Villas.  We were a party of 12 guests in four of the five villas.  Quite simply I cannot speak more highly of these villas.  Each villa was beautiful with gorgeous landscaping, sparkling pool and comfortable furniture. The staff were amazing - they catered to our large crowd effortlessly. A huge buffet breakfast was served in the dining room of our villa every morning with delicious hot and cold options and even eggs cooked to order. 
I had my birthday dinner at the villas catered by the staff. We had a lovely barbeque buffet including suckling pig. What a treat.  The villa staff surprised me with a birthday cake and unbeknown to me, my husband had arranged with them to organise a fireworks display over the villas after dinner! Truly a memorable night.
We had a 7 seater vehicle available to ferry us into Seminyak Square or around the Canggu area.  We could walk to several lovely restaurants, La Laguna beach club, and the beach. A supermarket, bakery, beauty spas, and an ATM were all at our doorstep.
All in all it was a FABULOUS holiday and I can't wait to visit Saba Villas again.  Terimah Kasih to all involved.
title: Birthday Celebration

owner_response.text:
Wonderful to read your very kind review ...it was all of our staffs pleasure.
Come and celebrate another birthday one day!!
Regards
Andy

text:
This is the second time my family have stayed at this villa but my first visit. From arrival to departure everything went smoothly.
The staff are amazing from arranging restaurant bookings to dropping us anywhere and arranging in villa massages all with a friendly smile.
Access to inns recreation club was a big bonus for anyone who needs a real gym not just a few pieces of equipment. Whilst the location is along a narrow street and isn't idea for some it does let you find hidden lanes to explore the many rice paddies only a few hundred metres away.
The breakfast was always a highlight in the morning. Anything rom cereal to smoothie bowls to eggs and my favourite banana pancakes.
The pool and the open living area made it a joy to just chill and relax amongst the manicured gardens.
The villas are well laid out and extremely clean with a stunning outdoor shower and water feature.
The kitchen is well equipped with a full size fridge,
The is an ATM, patisserie, supermarket and chocolate store and the top of the villa drive way.
If I had to find fault it would be that the lighting in the bathroom is too dim but really it's a holiday relax.
We stayed in Villa Yudhistira
title: Super Saba

owner_response.text:

text:
We had a fabulous stay at Saba Villas last year. I should have written the review then, but we have a small baby… and it’s only now as we plan our family vacation for this year that I sit and recall how amazing our time at Saba Villas was :-) and that I forgot to write my review (Sorry for the delay guys). 

It was a dream that became our reality for 4 days. As new parents with a 6 month old… not having had time to think, eat, or sleep in a while ….we landed in paradise. 

The staff, the accommodation, the room, facilities, service and the breakfast…. Omg the breakfast was just divine. We had a second room for our baby and nanny, and they would enjoy their breakfast at 6.30am while we had a leisurely a la carte smorgasbord from 10.30/11am…. To date one of the best boutique accommodation breakfasts we have ever enjoyed (includes Europe, South America, Pacific Islands and Asia).

There was nothing too complicated for the friendly, polite and sincere staff. Every team member at Saba has been there a long while and they are part of the essence of the place, Dewik, Suni, Aman, Agus and Made x 2. 

Made and Mojitio, along with the owners gave us fabulous tips about local dining and activities, Finns beach club is a heartbeat away, as well as the recreational club. We felt very safe and comfortable to leave our nanny and baby at the villas and head out for activities or a night out.

The villas are within walking distance to local groceries, a pharmacy store and some small shops, and the rest is no more than 5-15 mins by taxi.

Andy and Ross have also very elegantly but simplistically set up the villas. There is lovely décor and fittings that complement the environment but cater to the westerners needs of comfort and style.

We had lovely night swims in our villa pool, and the bathroom was just an oasis in itself. The kitchen was super functional and if some utensils etc were needed to specifically prepare a dish it was loaned by the lovely chef.

As a couple who were not so convinced about the whole Bali holiday charm, what we thought was all a bit of over hype in Australia was proven wrong. The food, activities, general culture and people made it a perfect mix for a wonderful family holiday.  

We hope to visit again soon, with our now much more active child.
title: An oasis hidden in Bali!

owner_response.text:
Dear Priya and Veneet,
It was an absolute delight to have you stay with us ..thank you for choosing Saba..do come back and I know our staff will be delighted to serve you ..best wishes
Andy

text:
Stayed here for two nights on the way back to London from Australia. I wanted something to distract us from leaving our daughter in Sydney. This completely did it. We were upgraded to a bed bedroom villa with a lovely totally private (not overlooked at all) pool. Vast property with full equipped kitchen, access to a very reasonably priced wine cellar, just above cost and certainly cheaper and a better choice than shops. Gorgeous bedroom and lovely huge sitting area. Additional toilet to the bathroom ensuite. Really charming and helpful staff and complimentary transfer to the airport.
I note there is one (and only one) negative review about Saba Villas. The comments are rubbish and stupid and reflect on the obvious idiocy of the reviewer. Ignore it.
I want to go back again and again. One of the loveliest places I have ever stayed. Brilliant for a honeymoon. I might just get married again - to my wife, so we can have another honeymoon. Superb. You won’t be disappointed.
title: Glorious, fabulous, divine.

owner_response.text:

Always very welcome back..
Andy 
Co-Owner

PS Re the negative review ...per my comment at the time ..it was a sham ..the purported guest didnt even stay in our Villas. Unfortunately TA wont remove it! Appreciate your comments even more so.

text:
I have spent a lot of time in Bali, but Saba Villas really takes it to the next level. The architecture and design, quality of food and service, spaciousness of the villas and gardens are all wonderful. As is the location - near lots of great Canggu cafes shops and yoga studios. Breakfast served in your villa by the pool, in house massages mean you can truly relax. 

But what made it really special was the private party the staff put together. We had a large group of 18, and interconnected the villas by opening big sliding doors. The staff set up a beautiful table setting in the gardens with handwoven flower garlands and lighting. We then had a feast including with whole babi guling (suckling pig), and the staff even organised private fireworks. Unforgettable evening for a very reasonable price.
title: Perfect for a large group booking

owner_response.text:

Andy

text: I was at Saba in Feb 2018 with a large group of about 16 people spread across the different villas. Firstly the lay out of the 4-5 villas was perfect for that size group: the villas all flow into one another and there are a number of small corners where you can seek privacy if you need some alone time. Otherwise the pools are all perfect for socializing as you flow into the different rooms. We were there for 2 nights (only....) and for 1 night the staff organized an incredible babi guling (suckling pig) dinner and fireworks. Superb night that created indelible memories. Despite how beautiful and serene the villas are, the biggest asset of Saba are the incredible staff who are so generous with their time and resourcefulness...I was also grateful that they were able to cook up some mie goreng at 3am! ;) Terima kasih!
title: Amazing venue for a big group, but incredible and resourceful staff bring it a notch above the rest

text: A year ago we started planning a celebration for our 50th wedding anniversary and a friend recommended we check out Saba Villas. It has exceeded our expectations by a long way. We booked the whole place — 9 bedrooms across 5 villas. Each villa has a pool. Best of all we have an amazing manager Made (a very common Balinese name) and his staff includes a wonderful chef (also called Made). The staff do all the airport transfers and also take guests to local restaurants or shops. In addition there is complementary membership of the nearby Canggu Club. The water park there got almost daily visits from our grandchildren. If you don’t want to eat out Chef Made will prepare a meal off an extensive menu.

text: We are long-time visitors to Bali and this is head and shoulders above anywhere else we've stayed. The rooms are beautiful, cleaned twice a day. The staff are polite, friendly, and very good. Breakfast is complimentary and you have a big menu to order from; they prepare it and set your dining table and then bring it at your chosen time. The food, prepared by "chef Singing Made", is great - a wide range of local and western favourites, with the burgers, Caesar salad, lamb rack and beef tenderloin among the highlights at competitive prices (most things are $A6-15) that make staying in for dinner an easy option. A ten minute drive to the heart of Seminyak in off peak hours and they'll drop you to local venues in the hotel car. Also a one minute walk to a convenience store, spa, ATM and a couple of restaurants, a five minute walk to La Laguna for sundowners, and 10 minutes in the car to Finns water park for family fun. Saba provides Finns guest cards for free entry and discounted food and drinks. Can't speak highly enough of the staff. We'll be back!
title: Perfect family getaway

The villas themselves at Saba are beautiful. We had the pleasure of staying in two different types over our stay, starting in Yudistira and finishing in Sadewa. Both were amazing with large spacious bedrooms and enormous private pools. Beautiful outdoor bathrooms in both cases were fantastic. The upkeep and maintenance in both villas was great.

The best part of Saba though are the staff. Our thanks go to Made, Aman, Mojito, Agus and all the staff at Saba who literally could not do enough for you. text:
We had a wonderful stay at Saba villas. We stayed for four night with our baby. The villa is stunning - a lovely place to just relax by a large private pool. Its in a great location- close to Kayu Putih beach, a french bakery (with great coffee) and Finn's beach club. 

The staff were really helpful and accommodating - they arranged everything we needed for our baby- which made this holiday really easy. 

The breakfast (which is included) is really good - our favourites were the smashed avo and eggs and the eggs benny. We also had dinner from the room service menu a couple of nights- food was lovely and very reasonably priced....The pork ribs were particularly good.  There is a full kitchen - so we could easily whip up food for our little one.

Thanks for a lovely holiday Saba - we hope to return!

text:
SABA Bali has 5 villas, interconnected if desired, with a total of 9 bedrooms - perfect for  a gathering of family or friends; or as we did, stayed in a 2 bedroom villa with one room blocked off.
The villas, each with pool, are calm, bring harmony and peace to us Sydney city-livers, and mean we return annually.
Staff are excellent, with silent smiling butlers; the chef is superb (breakfasts and travel to and from airport included); any travel around can be organised - anything at anytime is ok; including being left alone at times.
We have only had 5 star + experiences and will continue to go whenever we can. Nothing can surpass it!
Amanda and Peter - lovers of this paradise
title: SABA BALI Villas - an enticing perfect place to be

text: My family of four - with two young kids - enjoyed an amazing and ver relxing four day "get away" at Saba. We live in Jakarta and from the moment we were met at the airport by the friendly staff we had just the best exprience. The villas themselves are a spectacular retreat, very well designed and beautiful settings. For us the highlight was the pool, the kids were in the water all day and into the evening, and so were we! The food was excellent, starting with breakfast, with a fantastc menu setting a high standardeven compared to local dining options. We had to force ourselves to go out! Brilliant location, short walk to the beach of an evening to watch unforgetable Bali sunset. Saba, we will be back!
title: Everything we hoped for in a Bali holiday, and then some...

text: Ask for mosquito coils everywhere as it's next to rice padi fields and Mozzies are aplenty.. Patient service maximum privacy but far walk to main road and only one stall selling local eats. Preferably drive or ride a bike if you r gonna live there.. As blue bird taxis r hard to come by and other cabs demand their prices..
title: Considered Good Price Villa, Furnishings Tad Older But Max Privacy!

text: We have been to this property three times in the last 5 years and it has not changed a bit!  The villas are beautiful, the grounds and pools are immaculate, the staff is always so friendly and remember us year after year as if we were family.  Chef Made makes incredible dishes for very reasonable prices and he is very flexible and open to preparing your suggestions.  This is THE location to de-stress.  You don't have to leave the haven of your villa, as massages etc can be brought to you (for very reasonable prices!).  Travelling around in Bali is a little hectic as their traffic is crazy, but you forget it all in an instant when at Saba.
title: Three's a charm!

text:
This is my second stay at Saba and I am already planning the next trip back. These villas are beautifully designed and luxuriously appointed. Each has a private pool set in an exquisite garden and I took a lot of convincing to leave each day...

Bagus and the staff here are a highly professional team (and lovely company too!) and went above and beyond to ensure our stay was a success (organising bookings, drivers and even a trip to a shop that sells bedsheets!). 

Saba's food menu is impressively executed - I recommend the grilled snapper and ayam baker. There is a very decent wine list that is honestly the best priced I have seen in Bali (e.g. a 2012 Rolf Binder Shiraz for 340 000 rupiah). 

Membership to the nearby Canggu Club is a great extra and we got up there most days. 

Thank you Saba. We will be back!
title: Impressed

text: I stayed at SABA a year ago with two friends. After a year of reminiscing and recommending this place to friends I decided to share my amazing experience with everyone. The villa was gorgeous including our own personal pool and outdoor relaxing bathrooms. The service was impeccable and a Balinese dinner made by the chef is not to be missed. We loved our time there so much we extended our stay by 2 nights. You will not regret staying at SABA. I can't wait to go back and stay again.
title: Unbeatable

text:
This is the 2nd time my fiance and I have stayed at saba and must say the whole experience of this amazing villa has been just as fantastic the 2nd time around. The villas are absolutely beautiful,  the bathrooms will blow your mind and the staff are absolutely wonderful!!! 

The food was delicious,  the gradens were stunning and the private pool was so very relaxing.  

This villa is the is the place for you if you are looking for absolute luxury for a great price. If you are going with someone special we highly recommend the romantic dinner option...you will not be disappointed. 

I also feel that I must say that I read the 1and only terrible review of this place and while everyone has a right to their opinion I really feel this person has got it so very wrong.
title: We will be back!!! Again and again.

text: We stayed in Saba Villas for the first time in 2012 with friends. I have been back to Bali on many occasions since then but have stayed in other hotels. On my last trip to Bali I decided to stay at Saba again and without any doubt Saba is the best of the best. What a wonderful relaxing experience. The hotel is just so pleasant to the senses and the staff are just so nice. Thanks Saba

text: My partner and another couple stayed in the Nakula Villa for a week for our first visit to Bali. We fall in love with the staff, the food, the villa and with Bali. SABA was an amazing place to stay. Situated close to the fabulous Seminyak shops and only an $4-5 AUD taxi to Kuta. My favourite thing about the villas had to be the outdoor bathrooms and the pools. I cannot recommend SABA highly enough and have already planned another trip. Thank you to all the lovely staff for making Saba an unforgettable stay.
title: Heaven in the Nakula Villa

photos.caption: One of the bedrooms overlooking the pool

text:
We have just had 12 nights at Saba and have been thoroughly spoilt rotten.  If you need to relax then this is just the place.

I renamed it the "Oasis" as that is just how it feels.  From the moment you walk through the doors it just has the most calming atmosphere.  We stayed in the Yudhistira Villa (2 bedroom) with our 2 children and we all loved it.

The villa has a beautiful pool, set in a balinese style of garden which is just stunning.

The staff are so professional but friendly at the same time without being intrusive and were there to help the whole time with a smile.  They make you feel like you have known them forever.

We ate out a couple of times but all agreed that the food at the Villa is a 10/10.  I really do think you can't get better.  We tried most things but for us the standout was the Pork Ribs - I seriously think the best we have ever tasted!!!! The Chilli Crab was also amazing, the Chef is an absolute star.  The Western breakfasts were also perfect.

Would highly recommend if you need to get pampered and spoilt!!!!!!!!!.
title: Relax, relax then relax some more.

text: This is our second time at the Saba Villas and it was even better than our first time.  Bagus and his team could not have been friendlier - everything about our stay was exceptional. We were even upgraded on arrival to a larger villa. The villas and grounds were stunning, the service and food top-notch and the location - a 5 to 10 minute taxi from the hubbub of seminyak restaurants and bars perfect (you are close enough to eat out and shop, etc as much as you want with the benefit of being out of town where it is quieter when you just feel like lazing about your private pool and deck).
title: Another fantastic stay

text: My husband and I went to Bali with friends for a week and we stayed at Villa Saba, it was amazing. The villa was amazing, the staff were excellent, the food was great, the service was A1. The whole lot was fantastic. I can't forget to mention Sammy's shop down the road, Sammy helped with everything from supplies to transport and so friendly. If ever you need to be dropped off somewhere or wanting a car and driver for the day Sammy's husband Jaye is your man, a great guide.
title: Villa Saba

text:
My family, friends and I were counting down the days until our much awaited Saba experience - i was having my 40th at the villa as friends had stayed there previously and so it came highly recommended. We were not disappointed. To be met by the friendly, smiling faces of the staff who so warmly greet you is a wonderful start to ones holiday. 
We stayed in Villa Bima, one of the 2 bedroom master villas - WOW! The rooms so spacious, the gorgeous bathrooms, (my kids loved the little fish pond in their own bathroom). We slept like babies every night, beds so comfortable. 
We travelled with 4 other families, so we rented out the entire compound of 5 villas- each one of them unique in their own way, just as beautiful as the other..you cant go wrong with whichever villa you choose. The stunning pool areas are just a really gorgeous part of these villas to unwind & watch the kids play around. The gardens are maintained superbly also. 
Anything you need or want can be organised by the Saba staff...in-house massages, day trips, shopping tours, lunch & dinner reservations - nothing was ever a problem or too hard. We also took advantage of the complimentary use of the nearby Canguu Club, literally 5 minutes away and a great facilities. 
We're real foodies and were really looking forward to checking out some of the great restaurants that we'd heard had popped up since our last Bali visit. We didn't get to half of them as nobody wanted to leave the compound- once we'd sampled Chef Made's outstanding cuisine there really wasn't a need to go elsewhere. His pork ribs are divine-better than the local Naughty Nuri's ( Bali regulars will know what I mean!). The daily breakfast sensational, my kids still talking about Chef Made's banana pancakes!
Bagus, the Villa Manager, is all over your every need, as is Made and the rest of the team. I just cannot rave enough about the professionalism of everybody that works there. It's evident they genuinely love their jobs and thats what i think makes this place so extremely special. 
This was my 9th trip to Bali, I have stayed all over and in many 5-6star accommodations- Villa Saba, Canguu is BY FAR THE BEST value for money. I won't waste my time googling, searching Bali accommodation ever again. 
Bagus, Made and the Villa Saba team made my 40th celebrations so, so special - I will be forever grateful and I have such fantastic memories of this special occasion. THANKS VILLA SABA, THE BROWNS WILL BE BACK. 
Stayed September 2013
title: VILLA SABA CANGUU - simply perfect

owner_response.text:
Dear Michelle,
It is very kind of you to respond in such a genuinely glowing manner...thank you. We are extremely proud of the quality and attention our staff provide all guests. This attention is both in the service to our guests and maintenance and up keep of the villas themselves. We do hope you return before your 50th birthday party!...Cheers Andy
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My wife and I recently had a truly memorable week at Saba in one of the very private two bedroom villas. We'd read the TA reviews so we were expecting something special but were still absolutely blown away by the whole experience. We've stayed in Bali many times before, at both 5-star hotels and luxury villas, but Saba easily topped everywhere else we've ever stayed. With the large private pool and the lovely gardens, it was so pleasant just to laze around and enjoy the tranquility. The staff are so warm and genuine and are always on hand to help, and always with a big smile. The complex only has five villas so the service is very personal. We love to eat when on holidays and ended up having most of our dinners in the villa - thank you Chef Made for your wonderful cooking. This was our first time in Canggu as we wanted to escape the traffic and crowds of Semanyak and it was a great decision. Many restaurants and boutiques, etc have recently sprung up so Saba is in a great location. Access to the nearby Canggu Club is a wonderful inclusion for Saba guests and we used the gym every day. We'll be back again next year, hopefully for a longer stay.
title: Simply superb villa accommodation

owner_response.text:
Richard T,
My co-owner, Ross, and I sincerely appreciate your praiseworthy note on Saba. This thanks is not about the promotion of Saba, it is very much the pride and joy your comments bring to our wonderful staff ...I sincerely thank you for this. Our staff and their close attention to detail, is what makes our Saba special ...thank you most kindly.
Andy
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: My wife and I recently had a truly memorable week at Saba in one of the very private two bedroom villas. We'd read the TA reviews so we were expecting something special but were still absolutely blown away by the whole experience. We've stayed in Bali many times before, at both 5-star hotels and luxury villas, but Saba easily topped everywhere else we've ever stayed. With the large private pool and the lovely gardens, it was so pleasant just to laze around and enjoy the tranquility. The staff are so warm and genuine and are always on hand to help, and always with a big smile. The complex only has five villas so the service is very personal. We love to eat when on holidays and ended up having most of our dinners in the villa  - thank you Chef Made for your wonderful cooking. This was our first time in Canggu as we wanted to escape the traffic and crowds of Semanyak and it was a great decision. Many restaurants and boutiques, etc have recently sprung up so Saba is in a great location. Access to the nearby Canggu Club is a wonderful inclusion for Saba guests and we used the gym every day. We'll be back again next year, hopefully for a longer stay.
title: Absolutely stunning accommodation

text:
We always count the days and nights until our arrival at Saba. To see the familiar smiling faces of the genuine, caring staff  welcoming our family- all affectionately, & individually by name, including our two young boys to Saba, means so very much.  
We ask of their individual news, and they of ours, and we begin our tranquil & memorable time at Saba (time always disappears too quickly there). Chef Made(s) prepares the delicious fresh foods, the female & male staff are so gracious with the presentation of the table service/ after meal tidy up. The daily making up of the rooms happens so quietly & without interruption, even the garden staff & pool staff go quietly about their business- always with a generous smile. The Managers of Saba are very curteous & thoughtful- asking if we need assistance in any way. 
To unwind in the glorious surrounds of the stunning Saba Villas nestled amongst some rice paddies, hearing the rustling of the palm trees as we laze by the glistening pools and read, or chatting with friends & family, & watch the world go by in that beautiful balmy weather calls us back each year. Thank you Saba.
(PS. If you want to exert some energy, the complimentary use of the Canggu Sports Club, just up the road-  is absolutely fantastic- excellent gym facilities, grass ovals, & huge pool.
Locality of Saba is excellent- close enough to Seminyak for those shopping days, & amazing restaurants you would only read about just minutes away by vehicle.)
title: Planning our return- Again!!!

text:
My family & I had a wonderful holiday at Saba in June & are already planning to return next year. 
The standard of service & accommodation is outstanding & the food is fabulous. I did a cooking class with chef Made, which included going to the markets to choose the produce ,he also prepared a wonderful 3 course  meal on our last night which was as good as any of the top restaurants in Bali. The staff are amazing , friendly, helpful & can organise anything for you from dinner reservations, in house massages, sight seeing trips & reputable drivers etc. Two of my family members love to surf & there were some great surf beaches not far from Saba. We spent many hours by the pool, the outdoor area & gardens are lovely & so well maintained. The complimentary use of the Canggu country club facilities is an added bonus, the facilities are fantastic. Love the location of Saba, quiet & peaceful & only a short taxi ride to great restaurants & shopping in Seminyak. Looking forward to returning next year.
title: Sandra, sydney

text:
We had the most amazing stay at Villa Saba in Bali. The accommodation is outstanding with beautiful rooms and an exquisite pool.
The staff is amazing and the food is just delicious. 
We will definitely come back!
title: Saba Villa - Sadewa

text:
We rented the master villa, which was large and lovely. As everyone else has said, the staff in the place are very professional, helpful, warm and sincere. Someone always came out of the staff quarters to greet us when we returned and to see if we needed anything. When we got there late on the first night, the villa manager gave us a lift out to our dinner venue even though he didn't need to. Chatting with them we discovered that most had been with Saba since it opened, and they seemed like happy and motivated employees who were proud of the place. 

The villa itself is also very well looked after. If you are fussy, you would find that some parts of the furniture and finishings seem a bit tired (eg marks on some of the wooden furniture, some towels not 100% white) but for the price range I don't fault them. Everything is kept spotless, down to details like no water marks in the stainless steel sinks, the pool is sparkling and totally inviting, the beds comfortable and smartly turned down every evening. The daily made to order breakfast was very nice -- I loved their home made muesli -- and my kids looked forward to trying new things every day! 

Although I was initially concerned about it being a little out of Seminyak, I found this to be a non-issue. Everything was a short 5-10min cab ride away (or the villa staff will send you during their specified shuttle hours). Since Bali's streets are very unfriendly to pedestrians, if you travel with kids, even if you stayed in Seminyak you would probably take a cab to most locations. And since calling a cab typically ends up with a min Rp25,000 charge, it really makes no difference whether you're in Seminyak or Canggu or somewhere in between where Saba is.

Highly recommended.
title: Wonderful

text:
what a pleasure to re experience something as well the second time as the first time.

Little if anything had changed and the staff were as memorable for their service which is unobtrusive while being immediate to serve any request.

Its hard to believe we were there more than two years ago, and with so much change around the the general area as well , this place remains an oasis near some of the finest dining in south east asia (for us so far) - Metis; and Sardine. they are within 5 minutes drive by the Staff in the Saba Car.

But then again there was some incredibly fine dining put on by Chef Made (pronounced "marday") - the Roast suckling pig buffet one night and then the local variety specials with amazing salads another night, do prove you do not have to leave Saba to get a cracker meal.  One night he surprised us with a Lime "Creme Brulee".  I managed ot get a moughtful before the dish and all others were demolished by the hoard (my family of 5 plus one).

The membership of the nearby Canngu Country club ( and their gymn) is a plus and was attended daily by several members of our family.

like Arnie says - "We will be back!"
thanks Bagus and Saba , you deserve all of the praise.
title: Second time and counting

text: Saba is amazing. Our return trip to Saba was excellent in every way. My family and I were warmly welcomed and spoilt by the ever-smiling staff, from the moment we arrived. Nothing was too much trouble. The Villas are stylish and great attention to detail has been made to ensure that Saba truly reflects the Balinese culture. Many relaxing hours were spent by our private pool which is surrounded by beautiful plants and trees. The meals we had were incredible, whether we ordered Western or Indonesian food from the comprehensive menu. 5 minute walk to the beach, full access to the Canggu Club with its gym etc, and the pool on site kept the kids very busy. We all look forward to returning to Bali and Saba in the future. A great holiday!!!!
title: Saba - outstanding holiday destination - a real treasure

text:
We are a family of five & this was our 4th trip to Bali & for the past 2 we have decided by choice to stay at Saba. The main reasons for this is the beautiful layout of the property, each private Villa has its own amazing pool with plenty of grassed area to just laze around in the deck lounges. Coupled with this is the wonderful staff which are available 24 hours, the staff are by far the most knowledgable & friendly staff that you could possibly meet, it makes the stay, it really is as if they are welcoming you into their home.
The breakfast which is included in the tarriff is simply stunning, plenty of options to choose from, my favourite was the banana pancakes - yum!
Let's not forget about the incredible chef if you want to stay in for a lunch or dinner, seriously restaurant quality & again plenty of options, salmon, steak & the wonderful Balinese chicken curry to name a few! The bedrooms are large & the beds extremly comfortable, we all had a great sleep every time. The bathrooms are indoor/outdoor, simply stunning design.
What more can I say, if you are really after a truly amazing experience then you must book Saba.
title: Saba - Bali's best boutique resort

text: Villa Saba is a beautiful and luxurious retreat in Bali. Our children loved the gentle and kind staff, the amazing 24 hour room service, and the turquoise pool. Every time we left and returned to Saba, the staff was there to greet us with their warm and welcoming smiles. Everything was impeccable from the location to the minute details. It is among one of the most luxurious, comfortable and relaxing retreats we have experienced.
title: Bali Bliss!

text: The staff was SO amazing and took such wonderful care of our every need!  They represent 5 Star service impeccably!  The villas are incredible, luxurious and very unique.  And the food was fantastic.  There couldn't have been a better place to stay in Bali!   Truly one of the best experiences ever!  I am forever grateful.
title: Extraordinary property & service!

text:
Relaxing, tranquil, and all the amenities you could hope for....just minutes away from bustling areas for shopping and dining.

Truly peaceful setting with pools and gardens in each Villa. 

If you choose to dine in, the food is great...can't get enough of the the banana pancakes! If you choose to go out, the staff is wonderful in assisting with any recommendations and transportation. Everything you need is close by. The staff is friendly and phenomenally helpful. The Villas are very nicely equipped and decorated.
title: Top-Notch

text:
Villa Saba is hands down one of the finest  and most tranquil resorts I've ever had the privilege of staying.  From the hustle and bustle of the crazy Balinese streets, Saba acts as a private sanctuary for you to relax and immerse yourself in the Balinese culture.

The staff is impeccable and the food is excellent.  I would recommend Saba to anyone and everyone who is planning a trip to this amazing island.
title: Balinese Paradise

text:
Our family has traveled all over the world to more than 70 countries. We've stayed in dozens and dozens of private villas, many in Bali, and with out a doubt, the lovely Villa Saba takes the cake.  From the the beautiful gardens to the comfortable and modern accommodations, location, to the STELLAR staff - it's the only place for us in Bali!  In fact this January was our 3rd time!  We stayed for 3 weeks and invited friends to join us for some of the time too.  And of course, again, our experience was perfectly wonderful!
Can't recommend this place enough!
title: It really doesn't get any better than this!

text: We had a wonderful time at the Villa Saba. The staff were fantastic and accomodating. They did everything possible to make us feel welcomed and were just so warm and friendly. The food was FANTASTIC and the villa was well kitted out. We booked all 5 villas for a group of 14 and everyone was well pleased. Truly wonderful.
title: Amazing

text:
This place is amazing,
I stayed here from the 10-20th October, and was simply overwhelmed by the friendly and helpful staff, who constantly don a smile. 
The facilities are first class, with everything i needed in a villa, helping to provide an unforgettable stay. 
I cant wait to get back to Bali, and will certainly be staying at Saba villas again on return!
title: Fantastic Experience.

text: This is our 3rd stay at Saba and we will be back many more times. The beauty and tranquillity of the villa, the incredible staff and unparallel service make this a place so relaxing you never want to leave. The location is perfect, not too close to busyness on Seminyak but close enough to all the restaurants and services. It is Saba that inspired us to build a villa in Bali (watch out, you might like it too much!). They treat us like family, in fact they did from the very first time.  I can't speak highly enough of this place, you just have to try for yourself!
title: Relaxed luxury and impeccable attention to detail

text: If you are searching for a place to stay in Seminyak you can stop looking.  My wife and I cannot speak more highly enough of the Saba Villas.  Not only were the villas stunning; but the team under Bagus were absolutely first rate and incredibly warm, welcoming and friendly.  The design of the villas is exceptional and the gardens are exceptional. Coming from inner city Sydney, we were immediately transported into what was, essentially, paradise.  We originally were not sure whether it would be annoying staying ten minutes outside of Seminyak but it was the best thing we could have done.  The guys are happy to take you in or call you a taxi which arrives within minutes and costs next to nothing. It was great being able to break free from the hurly burly of Seminyak whenever we wanted but also close enough to get to the amazing beaches and restaurants on a whim. Amelia and I can't wait to come back.
title: Perfect place for our honeymoon

text:
We came here as one of 7 couples to celebrate a 60th birthday - what a perfect venue!  The staff decorated the villa in beautiful Balinese style and laid on the most incredible food - they could not have been more gracious hosts.  
Our villa was spacious and clean, the pool a perfect temperature, and the shared living area and kitchen very tastefully furnished and well equipped.  Breakfast from an extensive menu was served here every morning and we also had some dinners in as the cooking and food was as good, or better than any of the nearby restaurants. What a perfect place to while away a week of sheer indulgence!
title: Sheer indulgence!

Tables set up for birthday party at Yudhistira

text: We stayed at Villa Saba for 8 days and loved every minute. The rooms are fabulous, the gardens a delight, the pool warm and clean. And the food! - I was astonished that villa fare could be so delicious. We chose breakfast (included) from a wide range of offerings and occasionally ate in for lunch and dinner just because the cooking was so excellent. The staff was possibly the most attentive and friendly I have ever encountered. Special mention to the bathroom, which was so spacious, divine and outdoorsy that I admit I could have lounged in the tub all day.
title: Saba bliss

text: Have never felt compelled to write a review until now. We travel the world and are always looking for those places that we would go back to time and time again.  Villa Bima at Saba Villias is one of those places.  The villa is beautiful and well looked after.  You know how you start to think villas are fading after a while... well not here!  and you can see why as the staff are amazing and take brilliant care of the property and it's guests.  They always have a genuine smile on their faces and cannot do enough to help you.  You can really tell when people are happy working somewhere and the staff here obviously are.  The food is amazing..... it's like have your own restaurant within your villa and because it is such a small operation the service is super fast. The breakfasts are to die for.  We are half way through our 2 weeks here and already I feel compelled to write.  Saba Villas (Villa Bima), Bali along with Coco Island in the Maldives are now our two favorite places to visit and we will definitely be back.  From the preloaded iPods and movie box to the water cooler, everything is so well thought out. The minute you step inside you feel relaxed and it is truly and home away from home.
title: We have finally found the perfect place.

text:
This was our second visit to Saba, of many more to come. This villa is simply superb and we'd recommend it to anyone including those of us with high standards and expectations. We have a taste for luxury, beautiful surroundings, relaxing atmosphere and fantastic food: Saba doesn't let you down with any of the above (or anything else for that matter). We stayed in the two bedroom villas - a free upgrade from one bedroom both times- which are exquisite with huge private pool, gorgeous outdoor bathroom, and huge open plan living area. The design of the villa is simply beautiful!

The villa is managed by Bagus who has years of experience from top hotels around the world. This really shows as all his staff are very professional, incredibly friendly and attentive yet not 'in your face'. Chef Made is also world class with equally impressive work resume - try his fresh and freignant fish curry or go all the way and have a cooking lesson. Anything you need it's there, just say the word. Have a massage and a cocktail in your balee by your private pool (oh yes!). The only problem is you'll never want to go out of the villa and see all the things you wanted to see in Bali... Oh well there is always next time!

To have this standard of accommodation and service in a hotel you would have to pay thousands of dollars per night! So Saba excellent value for money. It really is pure heaven.
title: Pure luxury heaven from start to finish - couldn't fault it if I tried.

text: We have stayed at Villa Saba 3 times now - and loved each trip. We have been able to stay in 3 different villas each time we have visited, and have loved each one. The food is consistently beautiful, with our sons favorite being the chichen Satay. While the accomodation, pools, and gardens are absoulutely stunning,  it is the staff who make Saba. The staff are gentle, unobtrusive, & always smiling & eager to please. We have already booked again, and can't understand anyone who would make a negative comment. We are counting the days until we return to Saba again...
title: Fantastic Again!!!

text: Our third visit to Saba was better than ever. The beautiful staff with their attention to detail make for a truly relaxing experience. The proximity to desa seni for it's amazing yoga and the wonderful sunset bars along the beach was a great way to chill, relax and recharge with all the luxuries you could ask for. Great food, exceptional service and relaxed luxury.Heavenly
title: Always enchanting

text: We recently stayed at the Saba villas with three other families, taking up four out of the five villas.  The accommodation was stunning; incredibly well designed, beautifully maintained and very luxurious.  Couldn't fault it! The staff were friendly and professional, and catered to our every need.  They were also incredibly good with our numerous children who had the time of their lives running between villas and swimming in the gorgeous pools.  The food was beautiful - Chef Made and his team produced an incredible banquet served in the gardens one night that was both delicious and memorable.  Thank you to the entire Saba team for an unforgettable holiday for us and our children.  Would happily go back anytime.
title: Couldn't fault it!

text: The staff at Saba were 1st class. As this was our first Bali villa experience my wife and I had the single villa and we just wanted to chill. The location is excellent. Just a short taxi ride to the main shopping areas. I would also recommend taking a short trip to Echo Beach and having dinner there. The meals at Saba were excellent as well. Breakfast was a real treat. The other villas are well appointed for families. Unfortunatly our peaceful sleep in's were disrupted after a number of familes moved in a few days after our arrival and the children were up and playing together at 7.30am. The design of the villas is very compact and the single villa is in surrounded by the other larger villas. This we understand and in no way reflects on the property or its staff. If you have children and travel with other friends / families with kids this is a perfect property and you are use to early wakeups and kids going crazy around the pool. We also took a day trip to Nusa Lembongen with a tour company called Scoot. This was a very expensive and disappointing experience. The location is terrific and worth a visit but take the time and work out another way of achieving the same result. Thanks again to the staff. If you have a question they will do their best to assist. Well done Saba!
title: Excellent Villa Experience

text:
We stayed at Saba with another couple in one of the 2 bedroom villas for 4 nights. This was our 4th trip to Bali and our 6th experience at a villa and one of the best. The staff at Saba are very helpful, friendly and keen to assist in any way possible, without being intrusive. The villa is spotlessly clean, spacious and light and airy. The 2 ladies went to the local market with resident chef Made and then returned to the villa to watch him prepare 4 dishes of our choosing for our eager husbands. We opted for Indonesian breakfasts each day which were all superb. 

The pool and grounds are beautifully maintained and quite spacious. There was more than enough room for 4 of us to spread out with our own space in or out of the sun and really chill out.

I noted with amusement the review from the person who stayed an hour and complained about the road. Note: the roads have been upgraded recently and I think one can hardly blame Saba for the state of the local roads. And as to the complaints about the motorbikes, are they serious??? Clearly 1st timers to Bali and I wonder where on earth they could have found accommodation that suited!

Our friends had stayed here on 2 previous occassions in the more basic but still perfectly adequate villa. We are looking forward to our next visit and can genuinely think of nothing but positive things to stay.
title: Can't Wait to Go back

text: The images speark for themselves, but this villa rental was in no way high-end in our opinion. Booking agent insisted on 100% upfront payment, then refused any kind of refund when we arrived and left after an hour, and after seeing the awful property. Far out location, down herrendous pot holed road. No reception area, motorbikes parked in the enterance, villas with dirty floors, old furnishings, basic toilet. Generaly unprofessional and dreadful.
title: Not our idea of luxury on any level.

owner_response.text: In more than 3 years of operation our Villas have never received a negative review. In this case our villa staff, our booking office and I personally spoke to the guests immediately upon their arrival on hearing their complaint, and addressed their concerns. We offered them a free upgrade to a 2 BR master villa or a 50% refund (despite our published terms and conditions clearly stating 100% payment before arrival and no refunds if cancel within a certain period, as per general industry practice). They declined both (without even bothering to inspect the master villa) and left within an hour of arriving. The negative comments about furnishings and cleanliness are completely unfounded (particularly given all the positive comments by guests before and after this event). It was clear that they had a change of heart and wanted to move to a villa in the heart of Seminyak. Our villas are advertised as being about 10 mins from Seminyak, which is the case. With increased development in the Canggu Area the road near our villas did have "potholes", however while outside of our control, I am pleased to advise the road is now all newly sealed. I know this event was completely beyond Saba's ability to prevent or resolve with the guests. Sincerely, Andy & Ross (Owners).
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

reception - hardly!! more like a garage

text:
We took their honeymoon package for 3nights are really enjoyed each and every moment of it. 

The villa is also great. The decoration, private pool, complimentary massage what they have arreanged etc.. All were perfect...

And the staff was very friendly. The best thing was as we had to catch our flight at 6AM in morning we left our villa at 3AM, and they have packed our breakfast as well. Well this gesture itself shows how much they care for their guests. And it included freshly baked pan cakes as well.

You guys rock!!!
title: Awesome!!! I just loved it.

text:
I went to Saba Villa with My husband for our honeymoon.
We loved the experience, would like to go there again :)
The staff was very helpful and friendly, villa was very clean, everything was just perfect :)
title: Loved it :)

text:
Impeccable villas with an incredibly hospitable staff to match. 

Words can't describe how beautiful this place is, nor can photos do it justive. If you are staying in Canggu or nearby, you must stay here!
title: If you're in the pursuit for perfection - you must stay here

text:
I have stayed at Saba Villas twice and am planning a 3rd trip which says alot of what i think of the place! 
It is perfectly situated, placing it out of the hustle and bustle whilst remaining incredibly central to everything. 
The facilities are absolutely amazing but the best asset of this place is the amazing staff who are incredibly friendly and helpful. 
I have already recommended this place to a number of friends and family!

Tate
title: Amazing and friendly service

text: We stayed at Saba with four friends in November 2011, renting out a two-bedroom villa and the adjacent one-bedroom villa for a week. The accommodation was nothing short of incredible - lush, private and beautifully appointed (the bathrooms in particular were amazing). The private pools were breathtaking and always warm. The service was attentive but amazingly unobtrusive and everyone was very friendly. The daily breakfast (included) was delicious, as were the room service options. We also opted to take a Balinese cooking class with the resident chef, which was fantastic and the end result meal amazing. Especially appreciated the provision of a shopping list and the recipes to take home for our own future attempts! We ventured out into Bali most days but it would be easy to spend 24 hours a day in the villas enjoying the surrounds and great service. I would stay here again on any and every future trip to Bali.
title: Luxury villa living that's incredible value for money

text:
It has been a while since we stayed at Saba Bali Villas, but the complete and utter bliss and relaxaton we felt still remains. We have since stayed at other places in Bali, but for a wonderful experience I don't think you can beat it.
The staff are always on hand to assist.  When we arrived with our 13 year old, they immediately brought in a Wii for him and he was thrilled. The Bose surround sound was great and though we did not have an Ipod at the time they even provided one fully loaded.
We had people come to the villa to give us massages, which was so relaxing. 
Nothing was too much trouble and our driver Gagus was a font of local information.
We hope to go back in the not too distant future.
title: Saba Luxury

text:
My husband and I arrived back from Bali a couple of weeks ago and have not stopped boasting about Saba Villas to our friends and family, as well as trying to plan our return.

On our arrival Bagus explained that Saba is not just a hotel, but it is our home in Bali, and there was not a truer word spoken.  From the moment we were picked up at the airport to the time we were dropped off, we felt at ease the entire time.

We stayed at Arjuna, which is the one bedroom villa, and it was absolutely perfect for us.  The villa and pool were clean and it exceeded our expectations, as we know that when advertising a place the photos make everything usually look better than what it actually is.  However, in this case we were stunned by how truly beautiful our villa was.  The bed was so comfortable which made for a peaceful sleep each night. 

The food was superb.  From our complimentary breakfasts, which was one reason you want to get up in the morning, to the dinners, we were thrilled by just how delicious the food was.  We are both foodies and we ended up eating dinner at the villa every night.  As we went to Bali for my husband’s birthday we organised a special birthday dinner for him, although we both benefitted from the delectable cuisine.  They catered specifically to our needs, as I love seafood and my husband can’t eat it, and we were both able to indulge in what we enjoyed.  They even surprised my husband with a birthday cake and a rendition of “happy birthday” we will not forget, which was complimentary and again, highlighting what Saba is like, always going above and beyond.

The staff were wonderful and met every request that we had.  We were even lucky enough to stay an extra night due to an early morning flight, which wasn’t necessary but we simply couldn’t get enough of our time at Saba.

Saba provided us with not only outstanding service and comfort, it also left us with a lifetime of magnificent memories.
title: EXCEPTIONAL

text: by far the best place I have ever stayed in bali and almost the world. The staff are brilliant and every villas are amazing. Saba I will be back soon!!!!!
title: Exceptional

text:
We have stayed in many Bali villas over the years and the Saba is amongst the nicest. Very peaceful setting, but still close enough to grab a taxi for restaurant/shopping trips.

The staff and  food were excellent. As it was just my husband and I, we had a one bedroom villa, which was nice, but a perhaps a little on the small side compared with some villas we have stayed in. I'd love to come back here with friends as we had a look at the larger villas and they were superb.
title: Peaceful and beautiful

text:
We have just spent 8 nights at Saba Villas with my husband and two young sons.
On arrival the villa was perfect. Very clean and had everything we needed. 
The area is very quiet but only ten minutes by taxi to seminyak. 
Cooked breakfast was sooo good, we actually ate most our meals at the Villa as the standard of food was really high.  We stayed in Master Villa Bima, plenty of room for our boys to run around,  and the pool well  "awesome" big enough to swim laps and for the children to play with their pool toys.
The staff organised our massages, and even entertained the boys while we had ours out by the pool under the pavilion.  The staff are fabulous never intruding in your space, but always available for any request.
We would love to spend another holiday at Saba Villas and would certainly recommend it for a quiet holiday with the option of visiting busier areas if you want.
title: Wow true paradise

text:
Saba is an amazing set of the most beautiful villas near Berawa Beach in Seminyak Bali.  Our family of five (including three children) stayed in Bima – one of the larger villas with its private swimming pool, enormous space and comfortable indoor and outdoor living areas fitted out with hl tech and free wifi.  

The five star luxury assures that you don’t have to self cater if you don’t want to. The chef and 24 hour service provides anything you want; the butlers deliver and organise whatever you want at short notice; the staff are always attentive but not intrusive and the managers are always accommodating and they happily organise anything- including the daily masseuse.  

They organised several day trips for us with all the transport provided as well.  Not a thing wanting. Great fun and value.

Bagus and his team always smile and are just expert in delivering five star service. Several have international experience in hospitality. Nothing is too much trouble; from the time we were collected by Made from the airport; Chef Made prepared a wonderful buffet one night and a terrific BBQ another night (soft shell chilli crab was a real winner); the fresh daily laundered clothes were delivered as new by Sunni.   

We walked or rode the bikes to the Canggu Sports Club using the guest membership, which is included by Saba, and there you experience the old world like “Colonial Club “ with amazing sports, yoga, spa, training and dining facilities. 

Or just watch the sunset beachside a short walk away at a quaint bar with a rope and bamboo bridge.

Some of the dining experiences within a short distance of Saba are second to none  - have a look at Metis or just a visit to the Potato Head Club. Shopping at Seminyak or Kuta is only a short time away and so inexpensive.

Much more to tell.

Yes we fell in love with Saba and its team. We will go back..
title: Hard to beat the experience - a memorable place and a lot of enjoyment

text:
This place is just wonderful!  I came as a couple and we stayed in a private villa where we had our own private pool, open air living room and bathroom as well as a closed bedroom.  The ipod deck was a nice addition as we played our own music (though they apparently have loaded ipods for you to use if you want).  We were picked up at the airport, transported to the villa and given the most fragrant plunaria leis and these yummy honeydew/lemonjuice drinks the moment we stepped out.  Customer service here was amazing, they are all so nice and helpful!  

The villas are very clean and the pool well kept...so surprised, especially since I would think it would be difficult to maintain in a tropical, humid environment.  But everything was perfectly maintained and they are very good about giving you your privacy.  The decor is simple but elegant...I want a place just like this one day, lol.  

Breakfast is provided every day at any time... you can even request it the day before at a specific time so they can prepare it for you ahead of time!  And it's not just toast and orange juice, we had pancakes, sausage, eggs, fruit, juice, tea, coffee, eggs benedict, an omlette, etc. and it was all very good!  

Hmm, what else...you can borrow from a range of DVDs they have, they have free wifi and certain movie channels, if it starts to rain they send someone to pull down the bamboo blinds, they spray the room down for mosquitos, burn a coil in the bathroom for mosquitos as well, call for taxis for you, etc.  

Oh, and you can get access to the Canggu Club for free, which apparently has a huuuge pool, tennis courts and such, but we didnt have time to check it out since we were only there for barely a weekend.  But a cool feature none the less!

Overall: ambiance is so romantic (but would be fun for larger groups as well!), the place is clean and beautiful, the food is delicious, the service is friendly and helpful and I couldnt imagine being happier anywhere else!
title: Absolutely Perfect!

photos.caption: Night shot of the pool and living room
Lei and Drink they gave us!

text:
We just stayed at SABA last month, in the Yudihistra Villa. We've stayed at the Four Seasons Jimbaran Bay and the St. Regis Nusa Dua in the past, as well as other villas.  I told my husband Saba beat all of those as far as the actual accomodation goes. The Four Seasons and St. Regis still have a restaurant, beach, spa, etc. BUT our villa at Saba was so incredibly luxurious, beautiful and large.  And the service -- excellent.   

The pool was huge!!   The staff brought floating toys for the kids which were much appreciated.  Did I mention how big the pool is?  Easy to do laps, if you feel the need.  And at night, all the outdoor lighting worked -- yay!  Not always the case at most villas. Bathrooms were stunning -- loved taking a shower in our bathroom garden. And our kid's bathroom had a pond with fish and a fountain in it.  Ours was also lovely and bright; the soaps and shampoos were good quality.  

Rather than go to the spa, we had a massage team come to the villa. It was so wonderful getting treatments in the serenity of the garden there. We would do this every other day, scheduling our complimentary afternoon tea right afterwards.  Cost -- about $13 USD per hour.  Can't beat that, especially given the wonderful setting and comfort.

Laundry was done quickly and very reasonably.  Drinks in the mini-bar were far more reasonable than most hotels, barely more than we would spend if we had gone out and gotten them ourselves.  Breakfast was very good.  And we had the team make dinner for us one evening when the kids wanted to do a "movie night."  Inexpensive and good.

I would much rather stay at Saba again, or another upscale villa complex, than the two previously mentioned luxury resorts.  We felt like we were royalty given the surroundings and the good service.

My only complaint -- well there are two. One -- Saba is surrounded by these gorgeous rice fields, but you only see them when you come and go since the complex is surrounded by a high wall. It would be nice if there was a view, but then you probably worry more about security and privacy. So not much they can do about that.

Two -- I didn't really like Berewa Beach. There was garbage and it is too quiet for my taste. Others I'm sure appreciate the quietness of it. We would just take transportation down to the beach by KDT instead. It was very easy to get transportation.

One other issue. It is only 10-15 minutes to go into Seminyak, and it is all pleasant, lots of rice fields and animals to see, except the area close to Saba. It's pretty, BUT there are lots of bumps. This didn't bother my husband or boys, but I wished it wasn't so bumpy and twisty the last kilometer.

One last thing -- if you are here on a Sunday, make sure you head up to The Beach House restaurant in Echo Beach.  So much fun!  We stayed outside to watch the sunset, then headed indoors to listen to the very entertaining band.  Loved it!  Saba paid for our taxi there, and it was easy to get transportation home afterwards.  Make sure you take the Saba business card with you whenever you go out, so that the taxi drivers know where to go.
title: Wishing I was still there...

text:
We stayed at the Saba Villa for a week in August.  During our stay we stayed in a Master Villa and the smaller two bedrooms.  Upon arrival check in was nonexistent.  We were shown to our villa and served cool drinks.  No standing around the lobby here.  
The villa was absolutely stunning and was similar to the photos depicted on the web site.  The villa’s furniture, art and architecture were perfectly matched.  Everything from the teak bedroom clocks to the Bose sound system made the villa special.  
Location:
 We loved the location of this villa as it was very close to the beach (6 minute walk) and a short drive to Seminyak and the Canggu Club.  The beach was nice however be careful as there was lots of broken glass.  There is a nice restaurant on the beach where you can enjoy a cold Bintang while watching the sunset. The surroundings near the villa were very peaceful and quiet. 
Service:
The service at the Saba was near perfect.  Every morning staff would set the table for breakfast and straighten up from the night before so when you awoke the villa was tidy.  Our butlers arranged tours and drivers with no problem.  The staff all knew if you had a tour planned and made the appropriate adjustments to the schedule.  The staff immediately spoke to you buy name and quickly learning the names of the children.  As the complex is small, the staff provide very personal service to the guests. 
Canggu Club:
We used the services of the Canggu Club several times during our visit.  I would use the fully equipped gym daily and we spent our last day lounging around the club.  The Canggu Club was the jewel in the crown!  This was a very welcome addition to the villa experience and I would recommend hanging around the club at least one day of your stay. 
Villa Dinning:
We ate several meals at the villa during our stay.  The included breakfast was excellent with a large selection to choose from.  Eggs Benedict, omelettes, fruit, etc. etc..  We also ate a couple dinners and lunches at the villa that were very good. 
Overall, this villa was fantastic and I would highly recommend it  as it is a true five star.
title: A true 5 Star Villa

text: 夫婦と妻の妹の３人で2ベッドルームビラに4泊しました。サイトの口コミの良さを参考に予約したので少々不安がありましたが実際に泊まってみたらそのクオリティの高さにとにかく驚きました。設備の広さ、清潔さ、品質などハード面はロケーションの良さ含め申し分無いものでしたが、特筆すべきは全ての食事の質やスタッフの対応などのソフト面の素晴らしさでした。ひとつ例を挙げると3泊目の夜にビラのプールサイドBBQをお願いしたらシェフがわざわざスイカなどを彫刻した見事なカービングを手にご挨拶に現れるし、二人のスタッフは良い具合にBBQを進め、余った食材はビラの冷蔵庫にしまい、翌日昼に調理し直しに来て無料で提供してくれるなどこちらのリクエスト以上の事を決して押し付けがましく無く常に笑顔で対応してくれました。今まで相当数の海外リゾートに滞在しましたがこれほど心地良い体験が出来、帰るのが名残惜しいと思った事はありませんでした。またいつかバリに行くことあればリピート間違いなしです。
title: 本当の「おもてなし」体験

text:
les villas se trouvent au milieu des rizières .. très calmes , pas de construction ou chantier à proximité . les villas 2 chambres sont parfaites . décoration , propreté , literie , piscine jardin , tout est perfection . 
le staff set très professionnel . précis , organisé . donc un service digne d un 5 ETOILES 
Petits déjeuners parfaits et qualités des produits culinaires et cuisinier talentueux .
title: LE CALME ET LA BEAUTE

text:
SABA ist ein perfekter Rückzugsort und eine traumhafte Unterkunft für einen Aufenthalt in Canggu Bali. Die Strände und Restaurant sind schnell zu erreichen und man ist etwas Abseits von den Party-und Touristengegenden.

Der Service ist einfach sensationell, das Personal freundlich & hilfsbereit und das Essen in der Villa besser als in den Restaurants, die wir in der Umgebung ausprobiert haben.

Die Villen sind sehr sauber und modern eingerichtet.
title: Traumhafte Villa mit ausgezeichnetem Service

text:
昨年に続き2回目の滞在でしたがホスピタリティーの高さは変わらず良い滞在ができました。日本語は通じませんがスタッフはとても親切で丁寧、かつプロフェッショナルな仕事をしてくれています。
朝食は美味しくメニューも充実していると思います。ジュースはすべてフレッシュスクィーズされたものが出てきますしクロワッサンやエッグベネディクト等も美味しいです。ミーゴレン、ナシゴレンも辛くないので子供たちにも安心して食べさせられます。
スパサービスは街スパを呼ぶ形でその場でセラピストに現金で払うためサービス料は別途かかることはありません。バリニーズマッサージ1時間で12万ルピアでした。周辺のSpaに直接行けばもっと安いと思いますが自分のヴィラ内でサービスを受けられるのでとても便利でリーズナブルで良いかと思います。
周辺が急激に開発されてきているので道路も良くなり便利になりました。セントラルクタとBMCの両替所が歩いていける距離（10分くらい）に出来たり、サークルKが出来て急ににぎやかになりました。反面のんびりした雰囲気が薄れて少し騒がしくなったのが残念です。
しかしながら依然として設備のクオリティーとホスピタリティーの面でお勧めできるヴィラであることは変わりません。とても気に入っているヴィラなのでこのままのクオリティーを保ってくれることを祈ります。
title: とてもよい状態をキープしてます
